This signal indicates that a timer has expired.
lampGUI - Variable in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
 
lampOffDaySensorDark() - Method in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
This method tests the state transition from Lamp Off Daylight to Lamp Off Nighttime with the event LIGHT_SENSOR_DARKENED.
lampOffDaySwitchOn() - Method in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
This method tests the state transition from Lamp Off Daylight to Lamp On Full with the event MANUAL_SWITCH_ON.
lampOffNightMotion() - Method in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
This method tests the state transition from Lamp Off Nighttime to Motion Detected with the event MOTION_DETECTED.
lampOffNightSensorLight() - Method in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
This method tests the state transition from Lamp Off Nighttime to Lamp Off Daylight with the event LIGHT_SENSOR_LIGHTENED.
lampOffNightSwitchOn() - Method in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
This method tests the state transition from Lamp Off Nighttime to Lamp On Nighttime Brightness with the event MANUAL_SWITCH_ON.
lampOnFullSensorDark() - Method in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
This method tests the state transition from Lamp On Full to Lamp On Nighttime Brightness with the event LIGHT_SENSOR_DARKENED.
lampOnFullSwitchOff() - Method in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
This method tests the state transition from Lamp On Full to Lamp Off Daylight with the event MANUAL_SWITCH_OFF.
lampOnNightSensorLight() - Method in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
This method tests the state transition from Lamp On Nighttime Brightness to Lamp On Full with the event LIGHT_SENSOR_LIGHTENED.
lampOnNightSwitchOff() - Method in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl
This method tests the state transition from Lamp On Nighttime Brightness to Lamp Off Nighttime with the event MANUAL_SWITCH_OFF.
lcsm - Variable in class src.UI.SecurityLampSimulatedUI
 
light - Variable in class src.SecurityLightController.LightControllerStateMachine
This variable holds the light which is to be controlled by this state machine.
LIGHT_SENSOR_DARKENED - Static variable in interface src.SecurityLightController.LightControllerCommandInterface
This signal indicates that the light sensor has been darkened, indicating diminished ambient light and the approach of nightfall.
LIGHT_SENSOR_LIGHTENED - Static variable in interface src.SecurityLightController.LightControllerCommandInterface
This signal indicates that the light sensor has been lit up, indicating the sun is up and daylight is here.
LightControllerCommandInterface - Interface in src.SecurityLightController
This interface defines the light controller interface.
LightControllerStateMachine - Class in src.SecurityLightController
This class implements a state machine that can be used to control a security light.
LightControllerStateMachine() - Constructor for class src.SecurityLightController.LightControllerStateMachine
This is the default constructor, which will instantiate a new instance of this class.
LightControllerStateMachineObserverInterface - Interface in src.SecurityLightController
This interface defines an interface which a class must implement if it desires to observe the lamp state.
LightDeviceInterface - Interface in src.SecurityLightController
This interface defines those things which must be present for a light.
lightDeviceInterface - Variable in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl

lightState - Variable in class src.UI.SecurityLampSimulatedUI
 
lightStateMachine - Variable in class src.SecurityLightController.TestSecurityControl

This class implements a light timer.

LightTimerInterface - Interface in src.SecurityLightController
This interface defines that which is used for a light timer.
